utils

Class Input

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.Input

  • public class Input
extends java.lang.Object
    The class Input is related with input parameters. This class handles with the input files and it gives some feedback related with incorrect parameters defined by the user.
    Author:
    Nuno Mendes, Sofia Silva, Tiago Ricardo

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Input(java.lang.String[] args)
      The constructor starts by initializing all the fields with the parameters.

      Returns the maximum number of random restarts.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Input

        public Input(java.lang.String[] args)
      throws WrongInput
        The constructor starts by initializing all the fields with the parameters. If no index of a random variable is specified, the constructor initializes the field var with "0" (meaning all random variables).
        Parameters:
        args - The input arguments.
        Throws:
        WrongInput - If the input parameters are wrongly inserted when compared with the predefined Input format for this project.

    • Method Detail

      • getTrain

        public java.lang.String getTrain()
                          throws WrongFileExtension
        Returns the URL of the training file.
        Returns:
        train A string with the url of the training-data file.
        Throws:
        WrongFileExtension - If the extension of the files is not .csv .

      • getTest

        public java.lang.String getTest()
                         throws WrongFileExtension
        Returns the URL of the testing file.
        Returns:
        train A string with the url of the testing-data file.
        Throws:
        WrongFileExtension - If the extension of the files is not .csv .

      • getScore

        public java.lang.String getScore()
                          throws WrongScoreType
        Returns the type of score.
        Returns:
        score A string with the score type.
        Throws:
        WrongScoreType - If the score type is neither "MDL" or "LL"

      • getRandtest

        public int getRandtest()
        Returns the maximum number of random restarts.
        Returns:
        randtest The maximum number of random restarts.

      • getVar

        public int getVar()
        Returns the index of the random variable.
        Returns:
